name: hisn-muslim-scrapping
description: A sample JavaScript/NodeJs scrapper project based on hisnmuslim API to use all off the test & audios offline without the connecting with the original api

scripts.start: node index.js && node fetch.js mode=prod && node merge.js mode=prod && node fetch-sub.js mode=prod
scripts.dev: node index.js && node fetch.js mode=test && node merge.js mode=test && node fetch-sub.js mode=test
scripts.start:en: node index.js && node fetch.js mode=prod lang=en && node merge.js mode=prod lang=en && node fetch-sub.js mode=prod lang=en
scripts.dev:en: node index.js && node fetch.js mode=test lang=en && node merge.js mode=test lang=en && node fetch-sub.js mode=test lang=en

author: Mohssin Aboutaj
